body.name: HOROW T0338W Compact One Piece Toilet with Comfort Chair Seat ADA Height 17.3", Elongated Dual Flush 0.8/1.28 GPF and MAP 1000g, Standard White Toilet Bowl
features: Luxurious Toilets for Bathrooms: Modern toilet with ADA height design. Seamless, one-piece toilets design makes a statement with its clean lines and low profile

Chair Height Toilet: ADA Compliant. Features 17.3" height from floor to seat. comfortable height seating, it makes visiting the toilet to be more comfort as there is less strain sitting on or standing up

Map Flush 1000 Grams: Great Maximum Performance Flush score of 1000 grams, meets Water Sense criteria. Fully-glazed 2" trapway. Such a powerful and water-saving toilet bowl comes from our research and development of innovative toilet plumbing structures

Easy to Install: Two big opening holes on the side to fix the toilet much easier. Installing a new modern toilet isn't as hard as it sounds. All you need are a few hours and a plumber. Installation video explanations will make the installation process easier

Water Saving Performance: Siphon Flushing. Dual Flush 0.8/1.28 GPF. A 1.28-gallon flush provides significant water savings of up to 16,500 gallons per year, compared to a 3.5-gallon toilet, without sacrificing performance

Warranty: HOROW toilets are warranted to be free of defects for one year from the date. One-year Limited warranty on flushing mechanism and Soft-Closing toilet seat lid. Lifetime after-sale service, respond to messages in 12 hours
body.description: HOROW Dual Flush Toilet Questions & Answers: Q: What is the seat height? A: The seat height is 17.3 inches, toilets for bathrooms comfortable seat height. Q: Is the trap fully glazed? A: The trapway of all HOROW brand toilets has fully glazed trapways, and this modern toilet of MAP is 1000g. Q: What is the rough in? A: The rough in is standard 12 inch rough in toilet. Q:What should we do if received a broken toilet? A:You can contact HOROW directly by email and send the picture of the damaged toilet. We will reply to you within 24 hours to confirm whether it needs to be reissued or refunded. Meantime, the damaged toilet does not need you return. Q:When received the toilet, there was water in the tank and bowl, did receive a toilet that was returned? A:We will all carry out pressure tests and water tests to ensure the airtightness of the product. Because the product structure is complicated, it cannot ensure that all the remaining water can be drained. It is normal and please use it with confidence.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Easy to Clean Surface Smooth-sided, the ceramic glazed surface is easier to keep clean. Concealed trapway enhances the look and makes cleaning easier by eliminating the hard-to-reach curves and crevices where dirt hides. Even after years of use. That means you spend less time cleaning and more time enjoying. Super Quiet Soft Close Seat Elongated toilet seat included. The close-down process is very quiet, and it also has a quick-release design, which is very easy to install. Suggested Inlet Valve Location Please note the installation of the 1-piece skirted toilet design Please select the correct toilet for installation according to the position of the water valve. An incorrect water valve position will cause the toilet to fail to install. Standard 12" rough-in.

Two Sizes of Supply Line Inlet Hose Our toilet fits both 7/8'' water line and 1/2'' water line. If your supply line size is 1/2", you could directly connect your water line to the toilet. If your supply line size is 7/8", please take away the adapter, then connect it. Better Flush Toilet Bowl Dual Flush 0.8/1.28 GPF. Powerful and water-efficient toilet flushing performance. It’s no secret that a better flush gives you a toilet bowl, that's why we developed the T0338W toilet for the best flush. We push what’s possible to give you a clean and clog-free flush every single time. Quick Release Design Designed for this chair height toilet, our easy-release seat toilet features three steps of operating - click, take away, install, just where you need it, no matter when you want to change it.

Additional Features Material: Porcelain Floor Mounted Flush Is 100% Factory Tested 12'' Rough-In ‎Elongated Toilet Seat Super Quiet Flush Design ADA Compliant Glossy White HOROW Dual Flush Toilet Questions & Answers: Q: What is the seat height? A: The seat height is 17.3 inches, toilets for bathrooms comfortable seat height. Q: Is the trap fully glazed? A: The trapway of all HOROW brand toilets has fully glazed trapways, and this modern toilet of MAP is 1000g. Q: What is the rough in? A: The rough in is standard 12 inch rough in toilet. Q:What should we do if received a broken toilet? A:You can contact HOROW directly by email and send the picture of the damaged toilet. We will reply to you within 24 hours to confirm whether it needs to be reissued or refunded. Meantime, the damaged toilet does not need you return. Because the product structure is complicated, it cannot ensure that all the remaining water can be drained. It is normal and please use it with confidence.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars OMG Yes. Do not hesitate especially if you have a small space
reviews.reviewText: I was in the process of replacing my old toilet's seal when I discovered that the bolts that held the tank to the base had completely rusted and several parts were shot. Seemed pointless, since the toilet was over 40 years old, to try to get parts to repair it. I needed a toilet that was no more than 26" tall and had to fit into a very small bathroom. This seemed ideal and it was. Installation is a snap and unlike other toilets you buy, this company includes all the parts you need including the wax ring. The only real issue is that it is extremely tricky to center the toilet onto the flange bolts since you cannot see what you are doing and even trickier to get your hand into the small holes to screw on the nuts. Othewise, there's really nothing to put together. The toilet comes securely packed, encased in a thick Styrofoam sarcophagus. The company clearly doesn't want to take any chances with breakage. I chose to use one of the better than wax gaskets instead of the wax, only because when you are trying to center and place the toilet on the flange by yourself, changes are about 1000% that you will miss the mark and ruin the wax ring and then have to start all over with a new wax seal. The toilet looks great, operates great, and is a great value. My biggest concern was that because of the large toilet base, it was going to hit my water supply. My water supply line is much closer to the toilet than it is in most regular size bathrooms. However, the design of the toilet allows for enough carve out space in the back for it to fit. Yes! So pleased!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Toilet is as shown. Modern look in the bathroom. Functions well. Easier to clean on the sides than standard toilet with crevices. Love the look in our bathroom and buying another for our second bathroom remodel

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It toilets well
reviews.reviewText: UPDATED 4 weeks of using. It looks great & fits perfectly in my half bath. It's comfortable. Seat height is awesome. Easy to clean.Pros: Easy to clean. Looks Good from the ground up, except the short water tank.Cons: Seat and Cover takes 30+ seconds to close. The flush buttons are not easy to get to. I recommend a much taller water tank not the short one, for both looks and easier button access. It weighs 110 lbs. Moving it to install, especially lifting it over bolts to install is not easy if not a lot of room to do so. The holes for your hands to reach through to tighten it down are too small. There's no way anyone could reach around the back against a wall to tighten the bolts. Small hands will work through the holes on the side, but why not make the holes large since plastic fillers are going into them anyway?Pros point two: I have a new toilet in a half bath downstairs, it looks good, it works.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It will take a while to install if you don't have the right tools
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice and comfortable toilet I have ever used but it needs a good manual and should come with a ratchet wrench or any tool to lock the bolts.,I don't know why, but every time I go to the bathroom, I feel like I'm in a five-star hotel bathroom.It has a 17" tall seat and a larger bowl which greatly reduces my wife's cleaning complaints

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent toilet with one odd fault
reviews.reviewText: This is an excellent product and I can only echo the many previous enthusiastic purchasers. I did, however, encounter one very odd problem: the dual flush two-section button on the tank lid was installed incorrectly by the maker and was rotated 180 degrees from the correct position -- i.e. the smaller section triggered the large flush and the larger section triggered the smaller flush.I first tried unscrewing the plastic clamp on the underside to loosen the button and rotate it, but the clamp wouldn't budge. I finally finessed it by taking a wide-blade screwdriver and a small hammer and tapping carefully on one of the clamp's fins repeatedly, incrementally rotating the clamp and the button together until the correct position was achieved. Frankly, I would have just left it as delivered, but now the wife is happy, I don't have to listen to the complaints, and I am (ahem) flushed with success.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Toilet with Exceptional Customer Support!
reviews.reviewText: This toilet exceeded my expectations in every way. First and foremost, installation was a breeze. The clear instructions and user-friendly design made the process hassle-free, even for someone like me who isn't particularly handy.What truly impressed me was the outstanding customer support. The team went above and beyond to ensure my satisfaction. They promptly checked in with me to make sure everything was in order and that I didn't encounter any issues. It's refreshing to see a company that genuinely cares about their customers' experience.The comfort chair seat is an absolute game-changer. It provides a comfortable and ergonomic seating experience, which is a welcome relief. The sleek and modern design of the toilet also adds a touch of elegance to my bathroom.However, there is one downside that has left me a bit disappointed. Unfortunately, my Squatty Potty does not fit around the front of this particular toilet. It had to be removed to accommodate the toilet. While this is a minor inconvenience for me, it's worth noting for those who use or plan to use a Squatty Potty regularly.I still highly recommend this toilet for its easy installation process, exceptional customer support, and overall comfort. It's a reliable and stylish option that will undoubtedly enhance any bathroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Difficult to install / low quality finish
reviews.reviewText: I bought this toilet, but did not have it installed until way past the return window - this was my mistake. I had a plumber install it, I don’t do diy. His feedback was the holes in the side are too small and make it difficult to see to align the toilet onto the mounting bolts in the floor. The covers for these holes are cheap and flimsy and do not sit flush ( I have 2 of this style of toilet, different brand, in other bathrooms and the hole covers are flush) The extra parts that came up on Amazon as “ items you might need” were the incorrect size- again I could not return as I had them too long. In a nutshell this toilet is a great example of you get what you pay for . Thankfully the. Plumber had agreed a fixed price for this install , or it would have cost me an absolute fortune, 4hrs it took him ! I would not buy this brand again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for the price and it really makes the bathroom look great
reviews.reviewText: Great product for the price and it really makes the bathroom look great
